mapper.sql: id, video_name, video_cc_id, video_time, vodeo_size, video_status, item_one_id, item_second_id, video_tag, video_pic, creator, create_time, updator, update_time, company_id, school_id, storage_type, web_video_id, web_video_domain, file_path

v.id, v.storage_type, video_name, video_cc_id, video_time, vodeo_size, video_status, item_one_id, item_second_id, video_tag, video_pic, v.creator, v.create_time, v.updator, v.update_time, v.company_id, school_id, scs.school_name, sci.item_name, (select item_name from sys_config_item as si where si.id = v.item_second_id) as second_item_name, web_video_id, web_video_domain
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) from video where company_id = #{companyId};
select school_id from video where id = #{videoId}

SELECT date_format(create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") as create_time, sum(video.vodeo_size) as vodeo_size from video where company_id = #{companyId} and create_time is not null GROUP BY date_format(create_time, "%Y-%m-%d")

select res.* from ( SELECT v.id AS id, v.video_name videoName, v.video_cc_id as videoCcId, v.video_time as videoTime, v.vodeo_size as videoSize, v.video_status as videoStatus, scs.school_name as schoolName, sci.item_name as itemName, (SELECT item_name FROM sys_config_item AS si WHERE si.id = v.item_second_id) AS secondItemName, v.item_one_id as itemOneId, v.item_second_id as itemSecondId, v.video_tag as videoTag, v.video_pic as videoPic, v.school_id as schoolId, v.company_id as companyId, v.creator as creator, v.create_time as createTime, v.updator as updator, v.update_time as updateTime, v.storage_type as storageType, v.web_video_id as webVideoId, v.web_video_domain as webVideoDomain, 'video' as resourceType, v.file_path as filePath, '' as convertType, '' as excep FROM video AS v LEFT JOIN sys_config_school AS scs ON v.school_id = scs.id INNER JOIN sys_config_item AS sci ON v.item_one_id = sci.id where 1=1 and v.id is null and video_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{videoName},'%') and video_status = #{videoStatus} and item_one_id = #{itemOneId} and item_second_id = #{itemSecondId} and video_tag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{videoTag},'%') and v.company_id = #{companyId}
and TO_DAYS(v.create_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{beginTime})
and TO_DAYS(v.create_time) <= TO_DAYS(#{endTime})
and (v.storage_type = 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_CC' or v.storage_type = 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_QNVD' or v.storage_type = 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_BLVS' or v.storage_type = 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_LETV' or v.storage_type = 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_SCORM' or v.storage_type is NULL)
and (v.storage_type != 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_CC' and v.storage_type != 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_QNVD' and v.storage_type != 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_BLVS' and v.storage_type != 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_LETV' and v.storage_type != 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_SCORM')
UNION ALL SELECT rl.id AS id, rl.file_name AS videoName, null AS videoCcId, rl.upload_time AS createTime, rl.file_size AS videoSize, rl.del_flag AS videoStatus, scs.school_name AS schoolName, sci.item_name AS itemName, (SELECT item_name FROM sys_config_item AS si WHERE si.id = rl.sys_item_one) AS secondItemName, rl.sys_item_one AS itemOneId, rl.sys_item_second AS itemSecondId, rl.tag AS videoTag, null AS videoPic, rl.school_id AS schoolId, rl.company_id AS companyId, rl.upload_user_id AS creator, rl.upload_time AS createTime, rl.update_time AS updateTime, null AS storageType, null AS webVideoId, null AS webVideoDomain, null AS filePath, rl.file_type AS resourceType, rl.file_path AS filePath, sfct.status as convertType, sfct.excep_reason as excep FROM resource_list rl LEFT JOIN sys_config_school AS scs ON rl.company_id = scs.id LEFT JOIN sys_file_convert_task sfct ON sfct.file_id = rl.id INNER JOIN sys_config_item AS sci ON rl.sys_item_one = sci.id where rl.company_id = #{companyId} and rl.upload_type = 0 and rl.file_category = #{searchType} and rl.file_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{videoName},'%')
and rl.del_flag = 0
and rl.del_flag = 0 and rl.file_path is not null
and (rl.del_flag = 1 or sfct.status = 3 or sfct.status = 4)
and rl.del_flag = 0 and sfct.status = 0
and rl.del_flag = 0 and sfct.status = 1
and rl.del_flag is null
and rl.sys_item_one = #{itemOneId} and rl.sys_item_second = #{itemSecondId} and rl.tag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{videoTag},'%')
and TO_DAYS(rl.upload_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{beginTime})
and TO_DAYS(rl.upload_time)<= TO_DAYS(#{endTime})
) as res
order by res.createTime desc
order by res.createTime asc
limit #{firstIndex},#{pageSize}

select count(res.id) from ( SELECT v.id AS id, v.video_name videoName, v.video_cc_id videoCcId, v.video_time videoTime, v.vodeo_size videoSize, v.video_status videoStatus, scs.school_name AS schoolName, sci.item_name AS itemName, (SELECT item_name FROM sys_config_item AS si WHERE si.id = v.item_second_id) AS secondItemName, v.item_one_id itemOneId, v.item_second_id itemSecondId, v.video_tag videoTag, v.video_pic videoPic, v.school_id schoolId, v.company_id companyId, v.creator creator, v.create_time createTime, v.updator updator, v.update_time updateTime, v.storage_type storageType, v.web_video_id webVideoId, v.web_video_domain webVideoDomain, 'video' AS resourceType, v.file_path filePath FROM video AS v LEFT JOIN sys_config_school AS scs ON v.school_id = scs.id INNER JOIN sys_config_item AS sci ON v.item_one_id = sci.id where 1=1 and v.id is null and video_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{videoName},'%') and video_status = #{videoStatus} and item_one_id = #{itemOneId} and item_second_id = #{itemSecondId} and video_tag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{videoTag},'%') and v.company_id = #{companyId}
and TO_DAYS(v.create_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{beginTime})
and TO_DAYS(v.create_time) <= TO_DAYS(#{endTime})
and (v.storage_type = 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_CC' or v.storage_type = 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_QNVD' or v.storage_type = 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_BLVS' or v.storage_type = 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_LETV' or v.storage_type = 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_SCORM' or v.storage_type is NULL)
and (v.storage_type != 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_CC' and v.storage_type != 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_QNVD' and v.storage_type != 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_BLVS' and v.storage_type != 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_LETV' and v.storage_type != 'VIDEO_STORAGE_TYPE_SCORM')
UNION ALL SELECT rl.id AS id, rl.file_name AS videoName, null AS videoCcId, rl.upload_time AS createTime, rl.file_size AS videoSize, rl.del_flag AS videoStatus, scs.school_name AS schoolName, sci.item_name AS itemName, (SELECT item_name FROM sys_config_item AS si WHERE si.id = rl.sys_item_one) AS secondItemName, rl.sys_item_one AS itemOneId, rl.sys_item_second AS itemSecondId, null AS videoTag, null AS videoPic, rl.school_id AS schoolId, rl.company_id AS companyId, rl.upload_user_id AS creator, rl.upload_time AS createTime, rl.update_time AS updateTime, null AS storage_type, null AS webVideoId, null AS webVideoDomain, null AS filePath, rl.file_type AS resourceType, rl.file_path AS filePath FROM resource_list rl LEFT JOIN sys_config_school AS scs ON rl.company_id = scs.id LEFT JOIN sys_file_convert_task sfct ON sfct.file_id = rl.id INNER JOIN sys_config_item AS sci ON rl.sys_item_one = sci.id where rl.company_id = #{companyId} and rl.upload_type = 0 and rl.file_category = #{searchType} and rl.file_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{videoName},'%')
and rl.del_flag = 0
and rl.del_flag = 0 and rl.file_path is not null
and (rl.del_flag = 1 or sfct.status = 3 or sfct.status = 4)
and rl.del_flag = 0 and sfct.status = 0
and rl.del_flag = 0 and sfct.status = 1
and rl.del_flag is null
and rl.sys_item_one = #{itemOneId} and rl.sys_item_second = #{itemSecondId} and rl.tag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{videoTag},'%')
and TO_DAYS(rl.upload_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{beginTime})
and TO_DAYS(rl.upload_time)<= TO_DAYS(#{endTime})
) as res
